name: RJMP - India
description: Rajasthan Jain Mitra Parishad is the name of the enthusiasm, development, consistency and effort. It helps acquire qualities like team work, sportsmanship and leadership.  This is a special site exclusive for the Jain community of Siwanchi-Malani i.e original residents of Villages of Siwanchi-Malani area of Rajasthan, Now settled in various cities and states across India.  We the members of Rajasthan Jain Mitra Parishad Ahmedabad has come together for a noble cause. We are committed to the social upliftment of our community. We Pledge to work for our community in many ways. We have come together for social awareness and committed to expose the hidden qualities amongst our youth in educational, Cultural and Social field. Those who are members of the SiwanchiMalani Jain community i.e. original residents of Villages of SiwanchiMalani Area of Rajasthan and now settled in Ahmedabad City of Gujarat India are the members of this organisation. If you find any query regarding this site please feel free to contact us. Your suggestions regarding this site are always welcome.
